sentences: Nwaada Chinenye Onedibe ana etu DJ Flozy kọwara ka o siri malite ịkwọ egwụ na mmeme.
DJ Flozy bụ onye gụrụ 'Accountancy' n'IMT, Enugwu jizi ịkwọ egwu enyere ezi na ụlọ ha aka dịka ọ bụzị onye ama ama na ya bụ ọrụaka n'Enugwu steeti nakwa gburugburu.
Akụkọ DJ Flozy bu ihe ga-akwalite mmụọ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ
Were anya ga gbaara onwe gị Ekeresimesi taa.
Ndi mere akụkọ a bụ Chris Okereke na Chiemela Mgbeahụrụ
